_sText:
Readme File:
Extract all the files (and the folder resource!) in your cstrike folder. (default C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\your_account\
counter-strike source\cstrike)


DESCRIPTION :

This is my third map.
1st one: awp_source_map
2nd one: awp_source_lake

The action takes place in another little sunny village. There are two bomb sites in this map which are two squares:
"plaza del Mariucci" and "plaza del Sol". Counter-terrorists must prevent the terrorists from destroying either
one of the bomb targets.
There are three main ways to reach the bomb sites. I add sewers to the original map de_inferno which link the
two targets and the terrorists respawn.

Max players : 44 (22 terrorists and 22 counter-terrorists :)


FILES :

> maps\de_inferno_bis_v1.bsp
> maps\de_inferno_bis_v1.nav
> maps\de_inferno_bis_v1.txt
> maps\de_inferno_bis_v1.res
> de_inferno_bis_readme.txt
> de_inferno_bis_lisez_moi.txt
> resource\overviews\de_inferno_bis_v1.txt
> folder "screenshots" with some screenshots ;)


CREDITS:

Original source map by Turtle Rock Studios.
Original map by Chris Auty (Barney).

Special thanks to all who helped me through the web and its forums !


OTHER NOTES :

Pleaze do not modify these files and mail me if you have some questions or suggestions.

This map is dedicated to my friend Dimitri MARIEY.

I hope you will enjoy this map!

Piou
